meanings.definition: A succulent plant of the genus Bryophyllum, typically having fleshy leaves that produce small plantlets along the margins.
meanings.sent1: The bryophyllum in the garden had tiny plantlets growing on its leaves.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful bryophyllum with small plantlets on its fleshy leaves.
meanings.sent3: The bryophyllum decided to start a family by growing babies on its leaves!
meanings.sent4: The bryophyllum's leaves were like a nursery, each one cradling a small plantlet.
meanings.sent5: As I touched the bryophyllum's leaf, I felt the tiny plantlet ready to grow into a new plant.

meanings.definition: Any plant of the genus Bryophyllum.
meanings.sent1: The bryophyllum in the greenhouse was thriving under the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: People love to grow bryophyllum plants because they are easy to care for.
meanings.sent3: The bryophyllum was the star of the plant show, stealing the spotlight from the roses!
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the bryophyllum stood tall like a green beacon among the other plants.
meanings.sent5: The bryophyllum's vibrant green color made it stand out in the sea of plants.
